data.title: Base Set (Series 2, Release 7)
data.description:
Moments in pack:
- 3 Base Set (Series 2)

Base Set (Series 2, Release 7): This is our seventh Series 2 release specifically dedicated to the Base Set, an excellent value for collectors of all levels. Each of these packs contain 3 Moments from the Series 2 Base Set. A perfect place to start, or to complete, your personal collection. (As a common pack, when these sell out we may make a new release available.)

Base Set (Series 2): 133 Moments from 133 players in the 2020-21 NBA season.

In this pack you’ll have the chance to snag epic rookie Moments like Lamelo Ball’s first career assist for the Hornets, Tyrese Haliburton’s first career points for the Kings, or a slam from James Wiseman’s Warriors debut. Other Moments hiding in these packs include Kevin Durant’s long-awaited first bucket as a member of the Brooklyn Nets, a flashy dime from Atlanta’s Trae Young, and an epic throwdown from Los Angeles Lakers superstar LeBron James.

View a complete list of every Moment available in these time-limited packs (while supplies last). Any Moments in packs that remain unsold will be removed from packs and may be made available in future drops instead.
